content: end of the needle finished round 2 then repeat only round 1 until 8 8 10 10 sts remain on each needle cut the yarn and graft the toe merenkulkija socks page 3/5 toe continued from the previous page finishing left sock soak the socks in lukewarm water remove excess water by rolling the socks in a towel round 1 on needle 1 i e the instep k1 ssk and let dry flat or on sock blockers weave in knit to the start of chart a work the ends appropriate row of chart a until 4 sts remain k2tog k1 p1 on needle 2 i e the sole k1 ssk knit until 3 sts remain k2tog k1 abbreviations round 2 work the sts as they appear i e knit the knit sts and purl the purl sts cn - cable needle k - knit repeat round 1 and round 2 until 14 16 18 18 sts k2tog - knit 2 stitches together remain on each needle and you have just k2/k2 ctr - sl2 onto cn and hold to back k2 finished round 2 then repeat only round 1 until 8 then k2 from cn 8 10 10 sts remain on each needle cut the k2/k2 ctl - sl2 onto cn and hold in front k2 yarn and graft the toe then k2 from cn k2/p2 ctr - sl2 onto cn and hold to back k2 then p2 from cn k2/p2 ctl - sl2 onto cn and hold in front p2 alternative cable pattern then k2 from cn p - purl chart b provides an alternative cable pattern p2tog - purl 2 stitches together that can be used instead of chart a the round s - round s pattern repeat in chart b is significantly rs - right side shorter so it s easy to start the heel flap after sl - slip any even row of the chart please see a photo ssk - slip slip knit of green socks worked with chart b cable st s - stich es pattern below note that in the sample socks ws - wrong side in the photo both the gusset and toe decreases are one stitch off compared to the instructions given merenkulkija socks page 4/5 chart a chart key chart b chart key abbreviations k - knit k2/k2 ctr - sl2 onto cn and hold to back k2 then k2 from cn k2/k2 ctl - sl2 onto cn and hold in front k2 then k2 from cn k2/p2 ctr - sl2 onto cn and hold to back k2 then p2 from cn k2/p2 ctl - sl2 onto cn and hold in front p2 then k2 from cn p - purl rs - right side ws - wrong side merenkulkija socks page 5/5
